articles.author: PTI
articles.title: NSE, BSE remove Adani Enterprises from short-term ASM framework - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Adani Enterprises' securities are to be excluded from the short-term ASM framework effective from June 2, NSE and BSE said in two separate circulars on Thursday.

articles.description: Elon Musk has once again become the world's richest person as a sputtering Chinese economy hurts Bernard Arnault's luxury goods empire.
